product_name: La Roche-PosayToleriane Purifying Foaming Face Wash for Oily Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganRefillableLa Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Face Wash for Oily Skin removes dirt, excess oil, and makeup while maintaining the skin barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsPurifying foaming face wash for combination and oily skin effectively removes dirt, oil, impurities and makeupRefreshing gel texture transforms into a foam to leave the skin feeling fresh and comfortable with no pore-clogging residueHelps restore skin comfort and retains essential moistureSafe for sensitive skinNon-comedogenicDermatologist testedBottle made from 96% recycled plastic, excluding the pumpKey IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesCeramide-3 is a natural component of the skin barrierNiacinamide is form of vitamin B3 with soothing propertiesGlycerin moisturizes and hydrates the skinItem 2503388How To UseUse as a daily face cleanser. Cleanse morning and evening. Use fingertips to apply foam to the whole face. Gently massage, then rinse.Precautions: Avoid in eyes.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau (La Roche-Posay Prebiotic Thermal Water), Glycerin, Coco-Betaine, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Peg-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Sodium Chloride, Ceramide Np, Niacinamide, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium Edta, Capryloyl Glycine, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Acrylates Copolymer.
how_to_use: Use as a daily face cleanser. Cleanse morning and evening. Use fingertips to apply foam to the whole face. Gently massage, then rinse.Precautions: Avoid in eyes.

reviews.headline: Nice lather
reviews.comments: Feels creamy and lathers nice and my face feels clean and not dry and tight! Only need like half a pump too!

reviews.headline: This is my new face wash
reviews.comments: This face wash leaves my skin feeling clean and healthy

reviews.headline: My skin feels amazing!
reviews.comments: I love this face wash. My skin feels amazing. I use it about every other day, but I could be using it daily. It feels wonderful on my sensitive skin. Will definitely be buying again when I run out!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: Excellent product

reviews.headline: Burning and Sensitivity
reviews.comments: I started using this and within two weeks my skin became extremely sensitive and burned and itched all day long. I have angry whiteheads and clogged pores all over my face- I have never experienced anything like this. I have combination skin so I thought this would work great but it has destroyed my skin. Still recovering from the damage it caused. Highly recommend doing a patch test if you are interested.

reviews.headline: My new favorite face wash :)
reviews.comments: Doesn't leave my skin feeling dry after!

reviews.headline: not good for even slightly dry skin
reviews.comments: if your skin is like niagra falls i could see tou liking this but otherwise it is just way too drying

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: I love this face wash. I use it every night before bed. I have acne prone and super sensitive skin. I have gone through multiple bottles and will always repurchase. I love the refillable option too.

reviews.headline: Very good
reviews.comments: Me and my mom LOVES THIS cause i want to try what is the hype of thos product amd i love me and i wanted to do it on my mom gaves amd she love it also so highly recommended!!!

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Feels fresh and does the job well

reviews.headline: A must buy !
reviews.comments: This is the only face wash I use ! It's cleans my face so well with out stripping or leaving my skin feeling dry . It's hydrating and cleansing at the same time . I have no idea how they did it but it works ! I highly recommend this face wash especially if you have oily skin like me

reviews.headline: Not for problem skin
reviews.comments: I have been very fortunate to have "outgrown" my hormonal acne. Whether that is from the multitude of birth control's I have been on, or just simply growing in age, I am fortunate nonetheless. With that being said, in the last few months I have been noticing increased breakouts in my cheek area, which was surprising to me as I have been one of those people that maybe gets a pimple around their cycle and just simply rinses their face with water while in the shower. I have always dealt with oily skin so I decided to try out this face wash as I didn't want anything medicated or too strong, but enough to wash the sweat and oiliness at the end of each day and hopefully mitigate my breakouts. After about a month of use, I have noticed a slight reduction in my breakouts, but nothing major. I will say this cleanser is definitely not for "problem" skin or severe acne, but enough for a basic cleanser. It does however leave my skin feeling a bit stripped and dry so following up with a moisturizer is definitely a must. I personally use Bubble. Overall, I'm not sure if I would buy this again but it's a decent price for the size and works well enough.

reviews.headline: Love it üòç
reviews.comments: Ive been using this product for years it helped me out a lot with previous breakouts and dark spots

reviews.headline: LOVE!!!
reviews.comments: One of the best face washes Ive ever purchased. I my skin has never been super proned to acne but I would occasionally break out. After using this product I have not broken out SINCE (even during menstrual) and its been over two months since Ive been using it. For the price point there is a ton of product and lasts you months so youre really getting your moneys worth. I pair it with the facial moisturizer and let me tell you, the discourlation that Ive had for years is beginning to fade and my skin is BRIGHT!!! Highly recommend this brand/product.

reviews.headline: Wow the box was huge
reviews.comments:
I ordered about 17ounces of products 2 bottles and a less than 1 once free gift and they sent it in a 24x13x13 box. For product that would have fit in a 10x4x4 box or smaller lol. 
All was loose bouncing around in this giant cardboard jungle gym. No bubble wrap no peanuts no crumpled paper I'm surprised the pump didn't snap off from the top of the bottle. 
And what a waste on your companies shipping costs for a box that was the size of a 25 gal. Storage container. Thats the size of one of those black with yellow lid boxes you probably have in your garage or basement. 

Lucky nothing was broken. But do better. Now I have a giant box I have to tear up to fit the in my tiny CA recycling can. 

Yes, I would recommend because prices are good and it is a well known company.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I bought the skin care kit.and I was supposed to get a back to school gift.thats why I got it..they said they didnt have it.even thou they still had the sign up for gift.did offer anything else.thats pretty messed up.

reviews.headline: Great product, reduced plastic!
reviews.comments: I started with the original full-size bottle with pump but used this refill pouch once the bottle was completely empty; no complaints about the refill design.  l have combination skin, and I really like this fragrance-free, clean-rinsing, foaming, and non-drying cleanser.  I don't wear foundation, but I do wear sunscreen, loose powder, and tubing mascara.  This face wash works well for me if I start with a wet face, lather the product in my hands, and then apply it.  My skin is sensitive, so I just use my fingers and to loosen and massage the sunscreen and other products off, with just a bit of attention on the lash line for the mascara.  Everything rinses cleanly away, and the product seems less harsh than other foaming cleansers I've tried.

reviews.headline: Favorite
reviews.comments: Love this product, definitely a must have for oily sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Good Product, Bad Bottle
reviews.comments:
I have been using this product for years! I double cleanse with it and it takes off my makeup well and doesnt overly strip my face. I also like how I can use this cleanser both in the summer and winter as I can be prone to oily skin in the summer and dry skin in the winter. I also love how one bottle seems to last me a long time! Another pro is that it seems to help with my hormonal acne as well :)

A huge con however is that it is true that the spring in the pump does rust. Ive only recently noticed this but it is gross nonetheless. I still love this cleanser I just buy the refils and reuse a different bottle from another cleanser I had.

reviews.headline: Cleanses w/o creating dry feeling
reviews.comments: Gets rid of the oily skin feeling that I deal with a lot of the day but does not replace it with a dried-out, stretched feeling. I like this a lot and have had zero pimples or zits since starting to use it. I started using this in May and it's now the end of June. I'm very impressed. I first tried this by using a sample I got at a yearly derm doc appointment.

media.caption: Look at that foam!

media.headline: Clean Feeling and Non-Drying Foaming Facial Cleanser
media.caption: Clean design on this bottle.

media.headline: My favorite cleanser
media.caption: This really is my favorite and I'm obsessed with owning all the cleansers I can. This might be the one I keep!

faceoff_positive.comments: This cleanser is so nice...no oil, no alcohol, no sulfates, no fragrance, minimal eye irritation. I have super oily skin, and use it twice daily. Half a pump is all I need to get lots of lather, especially when I use my natural sea sponge on exfolation days. It REALLY lathers well, and one bottle lasts a long time. I've been using this twice daily for two months now, and I'm only half way through the bottle. It's a great price for the quantity and quality of product you get. It doesn't dry or irritate my skin, either. I would recommend using a micellar water or makeup remover before washing your face with this, though, just to make sure you've got ALL of the makeup off, and a toner afterwards. It leaves the skin feeling very clean without feeling stripped. I don't think it would work for drier skin, though. Sensitive skinned people should be fine using this. My skin is slightly sensitive and I've had no problems with it at all. I will repurchase.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Cleanser!

faceoff_negative.comments: I wanted to love this product and brand over all but noticed around the end of July my face was burning. My under eyes were burning and very irritated. I stopped all make up products and everything and was only using the eye cream, face cream and face wash and my face continued to burn, peel, and flake. I would not recommend.
faceoff_negative.headline: Do not recommend
